settings.name: VIDEONORMALLEVEL
settings.description: Display brightness level in % when this power plan is activated

settings.name: f1fbfde2-a960-4165-9f88-50667911ce96
settings.description: Display brightness level in % when the display gets dimmed

settings.name: VIDEODIM
settings.description: Display is dimmed after the given timeout in seconds

settings.name: VIDEOIDLE
settings.description: Turn off display after the given timeout in seconds

settings.name: VIDEOCONLOCK
settings.description: Turn off display after the given timeout in seconds when system is locked

settings.name: STANDBYIDLE
settings.description: Timeout in seconds before system goes to sleep

settings.name: UNATTENDSLEEP
settings.description: Timeout in seconds before system enters sleep after waking up unattended

settings.name: HIBERNATEIDLE
settings.description: Hibernate after the given timeout in seconds post sleep

settings.name: RTCWAKE
settings.description: Timed events are allowed to wake system from sleep

settings.name: HUPRVIDEODIM
settings.description: Dim timeout in seconds after a Presence sensor detects user as inattentive

settings.name: HUPRVIDEOIDLEINATTENTIVE
settings.description: Display timeout in seconds after a Presence sensor detects user as inattentive

settings.name: HUPRVIDEODIMAWAY
settings.description: Dim timeout in seconds after a Presence sensor detects user as away

settings.name: HUPRVIDEOIDLE
settings.description: Display timeout in seconds after a Presence sensor detects user as away

settings.name: NSENINPUTPRETIME
settings.description: Timeout in seconds after detecting user input before considering user as present

settings.name: USERPRESENCEPREDICTION
settings.description: Specify whether to use OS User Presence detection model

settings.name: STANDBYRESERVETIME
settings.description: Timeout in seconds the device can remain idle before system starts reserving battery for standby

settings.name: STANDBYRESETPERCENT
settings.description: Battery % at which standby budget will reset

settings.name: STANDBYBUDGETGRACEPERIOD
settings.description: Grace period in seconds before taking adaptive action when the system has exceeded its standby budget

settings.name: STANDBYBUDGETREFRESHINTERVAL
settings.description: Interval in seconds between standby budget refreshes

settings.name: STANDBYBUDGETPERCENT
settings.description: Allowed battery drain % during each budget cycle while in standby

settings.name: STANDBYBUDGETREFRESHCOUNT
settings.description: Total number of times standby budget can be refreshed before strict enforcement begins

settings.name: STANDBYRESERVEGRACEPERIOD
settings.description: Grace period in seconds before taking adaptive action when the system is below reserve battery level

settings.name: PROCTHROTTLEMIN
settings.description: Minimum performance state of the system in %

settings.name: ESBRIGHTNESS
settings.description: Brightness in % to scale to when Energy Saver is turned on

settings.name: ASPM
settings.description: Power plan for PCI Express link

settings.name: PERSONALITY
settings.description: Power plan type

settings.name: DEVICEIDLE
settings.description: Idle timeout strategy to use (Performance or Conservation)

settings.name: CONSOLELOCK
settings.description: Need to enter password when the system resumes from sleep

settings.name: CONNECTIVITYINSTANDBY
settings.description: Allow networking during standby

settings.name: DISCONNECTEDSTANDBYMODE
settings.description: Standby mode when disconnected from network
